instructions: On your iPhone, open Settings . Tap Passwords & Accounts . Scroll to the bottom of the screen and select Add Account . The next screen contains all of the different email accounts you can add to your iPhone, including an "Other" category for ones it doesn't list. Tap Gmail , and then enter your Gmail address on the next screen. Select Next , and then put in your password and tap Next again. Check that the switch next to Contacts is on/green, and then tap Save . All of your Gmail contacts are now available to email on your iPhone. You can sync contacts from different providers by picking that domain after you tap Add Account.
